mapper.select: select id, nickname, post_num, post_title, post_content, thumbnail, like_cnt, to_char(input_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') input_date from (select post.id, nickname, post.post_num, post_title, post_content, thumbnail, like_cnt,like_post.input_date, row_number() over(order by like_post.input_date desc) rnum from like_post, post, member, (select post_num, count(post_num) like_cnt from like_post group by post_num) like_c where post.post_num=like_post.post_num and post.post_num=like_c.post_num and post.id=member.id and delete_flag='F' and like_post.id=#{ column_value }) where rnum between #{ start_num } and #{ end_num }
